scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "npm run build:common"
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:common
scripts.types: npm run types:backend && npm run types:frontend && npm run types:common
scripts.common:prod: concurrently "cd backend && npm run common:prod" "cd frontend && npm run common:prod"
scripts.common:dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run common:dev" "cd frontend && npm run common:dev"
scripts.postinstall: cd common && npm i && cd .. && concurrently "cd backend && npm i" "cd frontend && npm i"
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:common && npm run deploy:frontend && npm run deploy:backend
